game.name: Top Burger
game.description:
It is always a great honor to be a top burger chef of the city! Oh lady! There are multiple things to take care of when you manage a top burger shop in the city. Well, you are playing the role of an owner of a very popular burger point where a great number of customers comes daily to satisfy their burger cravings. Your job is to prepare the order of each customer and serve it to them as fast as you can to save your shop and improve your business in Top Burger.

Timely completion of each customer order will reward you with some extra money. Try to grab as much points and money as you can to unlock the bigger burger world in this one of the best HTML5 cooking games for girls. Find out the order of your customer by looking at the right side of the screen and get ready to create them carefully! The bottom part of the screen will show you a list of multiple ingredients you have to use during the preparation of this popular fast food of the city.

Make sure to complete the order of your customer by clicking the ingredients in the correct order. You will be received some gold coins when you complete each burger. Be fast and complete each order without making any mistakes otherwise you will lose your customers in this fun food game! There are multiple game modes, and three different worlds to explore. Complete all the orders before the time runs out in this girls game! Try out more free girls games and learn new recipes every day without download!
